channel.title: Changeing Experience Gained! NEED HELP =(!~
channel.description: Yea I Was Wundering How I Can change The Amount Of XP Gained From A Hit Or Kill W.e It Is... Plz Help :D

item.title: Changeing Experience Gained! NEED HELP =(!~
item.dc:creator: @master257 master257
item.description:
@master257 wrote:

I Hate Being a Noob At This… =( But So What I Have Here: if (FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double)(250 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
addSkillXP((5 * hitDiff), 18);
} else {
TotalExp = (double)(250 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
addSkillXP((5 * hitDiff), 18);
}
TotalExp = (double)(250 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
addSkillXP((5 * hitDiff), 18);

I Just Need To Change It To What You Gave Right? [br][size=1]Posted on: October 06, 2007, 09:25:16 AM[/size][hr]So I changed the “250” Too “2”[br][size=1]Posted on: October 06, 2007, 09:26:16 AM[/size][hr]Stil Didnt Work… Its Giving Like 250 xp A Hit Or sumtin

Read full topic

item.title: Changeing Experience Gained! NEED HELP =(!~
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

I shall try to explain it better, I rushed.

TotalExp = (double)(2 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); addSkillXP((5 * hitDiff), 18);
If you hit a 1, it should add 8xp times your CombatExpRate.
Just read it: TotalExp = (double)(2 * hitDiff)
That’s double of 2, which is 2 times the hitDiff, which in this case is 1, so you’re getting 2xp.

Then the second one: TotalExp = 2 times TotalExp(which above is stated as equaling 2 in this case) times the CombatExpRate.
So you’re getting ((1*(2*2)) * 2) * combatExpRate
That equals 8.

Clear enough?

Read full topic

item.title: Changeing Experience Gained! NEED HELP =(!~
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

              TotalExp = (double)(250 * hitDiff);
              TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
              addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
              addSkillXP((5 * hitDiff), 18);

TotalExp is 2 times (250 times what you hit)
Which is equal to 2 times (^that^ times the CombatExpRate)

The skill added, is the TotalExp, and you’re getting 5 times your hit for slayer xp.

Read full topic
